text: @markknoller @realDonaldTrump After Speaker Pelosi and Minority Leader Schumer pushed him.  This is the ONLY recognition trump has shown for any of the nearly 100,000 victims of the Coronavirus. It wouldn’t have happened without Pelosi and Schumer!
